thread.title: Great hotel - again
thread.title_full: Great hotel - again - Review of Pullman London St Pancras Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Grant T
title: Great hotel - again
text: This is the second time I have stayed at this hotel - albeit two years later. I'm pleased to say it has not changed all that much. Staff are helpful, the restaurant is great and the rooms are just as nice. We were staying on points so there is always the possibility you get lumbered with a dud room - however this was not the case. A great room on the high floor looking over the main road. Great bed, great room, great stay!
